full_summary:
=====================================

**Property Tax Management Professional Services**
====================================================

**Government Tender Announcement ID**: MX-443137355378

**Publication Date**: May 23, 2024

This solicitation seeks to retain the services of a professional firm to provide comprehensive property tax management services for VIA Rail Canada's extensive portfolio of properties across Canada.

**Key Details**:
---------------

* **Contracting Entity**: VIA Rail Canada Inc.
* **Contract Address**: 3 Place Ville-Marie, Suite 500, Montreal, QC, H3B 2C9, Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Tran Trinh, [tran_trinh@viarail.ca](mailto:tran_trinh@viarail.ca), 514-871-6967
* **Notice URL**: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2926843972/abstract?language=EN (English)

**Scope of Work**:
----------------

The successful bidder will be responsible for managing VIA Rail Canada's property tax portfolio, encompassing over 300 properties and generating over 400 invoices annually. This mandate includes:

* Property tax assessment and payment
* Tax compliance and reporting
* Invoicing and billing management
* Property tax planning and strategy development

** Tender Requirements**:
----------------------

Bidding and documents are available on [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). A valid subscription is required to access the solicitation materials. Fees may apply; please refer to [www.merx.com/public/pricing](http://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.

**Trade Agreements**:
-----------------

This solicitation is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and other applicable trade agreements. Refer to the solicitation documents for more information.

**Closing Date**: July 4, 2024, 12:00:00 PM Eastern Time. Late submissions will not be accepted.
